metadata.title: CVE-2019-12098 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In the client side of Heimdal before 7.6.0, failure to verify anonymous PKINIT PA-PKINIT-KX key exchange permits a man-in-the-middle attack. This issue is in krb5_init_creds_step in lib/krb5/init_creds_pw.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-12098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

heimdal-clients - 7.5.0+dfsg-3build1
heimdal-kcm - 7.5.0+dfsg-3build1
heimdal-kdc - 7.5.0+dfsg-3build1
heimdal-multidev - 7.5.0+dfsg-3build1
heimdal-servers - 7.5.0+dfsg-3build1
libasn1-8-heimdal - 7.5.0+dfsg-3build1
libgssapi3-heimdal - 7.5.0+dfsg-3build1
libhcrypto4-heimdal - 7.5.0+dfsg-3build1

notes.note: leosilva> it fails with a FTBFS on certs tests. This issue is probably related: https://github.com/heimdal/heimdal/issues/533.
